title: Lenny Henry's Race Through Comedy
overview: Lenny Henry's Race Through Comedy concentrates primarily on British comedy of colour over the last five decades. Each film focuses on a particular area of comedy; sitcom, stand-up and sketch comedy.Through the series there are contributions from a whole host of comedy greats including Meera Syal, Paul Whitehouse, Gina Yashere, Stephen K Amos, Javone Prince and Richard Curtis.
